GTI_ISO_HOR.description: Global tilted irradiance - isotropic + horizon belt component

GTI_DIR_NOSHD.description: Global tilted irradiance - direct component, without shading

GTI_CIRC_NOSHD.description: Global tilted irradiance - circumsolar component, without shading

GTI_REFL_NOSHD.description: Global tilted irradiance - reflected component, without shading

GTI_ISO_HOR_NOSHD.description: Global tilted irradiance - isotropic + horizon belt component, without shading

GTI_EFF_NOSHD.description: Global tilted irradiance - effective, without shading

CI_FLAG.description: Cloud identification quality flag: 0: sun below horizon, 1: model value, 2: interpolated <=1hour, 3: extrapolated <=1hour, 4: interpolated/extrapolated >1hour,  5: long term monthly median or persistence,  6: synthetic data, 10: nowcast, 11:NWP forecast

SNOW_FLAG.description: Snow classification flag: 0: unknown, 1: snowfree, 2: snow, 3: snow/snowfree mixture

SUN_AZIMUTH.description: Sun azimuth angle. North = 0 (360) deg, East = 90 deg, South = 180 deg, West = 270 deg.

SUN_ASPECT.description: Sun aspect angle. South = 0 deg, East = -90 deg, West = 90 deg, North = 180 (-180) deg.

PANEL_AZIMUTH.description: Azimuth of inclined surface. North = 0 (360) deg, East = 90 deg, South = 180 deg, West = 270 deg.

WS80.$comment: This is just an example of different height levels, refer to solargis_common_enums.schema.json#/$defs/SolargisWindHeightColumnNamesPattern

SDWE.description: Water equivalent of accumulated snow depth
